valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 10 Nov 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 11 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Bailey 993 moving steadily west and losing its identity by 1800 Monday. New low expected Fair Isle 992 by same time
